about_the_game:
Midnight Scenes: From the Woods Soundtrack.

Get spooked by these music tracks composed by Octavi Navarro himself.
It includes 18 music pieces in MP3.
Tracks will be downloaded to your game's Steam folder.

Every purchase of the Soundtrack DLC will help us on creating future games. Thank you!
